title: book_Storming_the_Gates_of_Paradise
text:
ISBN-13: 9780520251090.
ISBN-10: 0520251091.
Title: Storming the Gates of Paradise.
Subtitle: Landscapes for Politics.
Authors: Rebecca Solnit.
Categories: History.
Thumbnail: http://books.google.com/books/content?id=BtG1-Scm08kC&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&edge=curl&source=gbs_api.
Description: An anthology of nearly forty essays, representing the author's work over the past ten years, offers an insightful overview of American politics, current affairs, culture, society, and history, written from the perspective of a noted environmentalist, anti-globalization activist, and public intellectual. By the author of A Field Guide to Getting Lost..
Published Year: 2007.
Average Rating: 4.2.
Number of Pages: 416.
Ratings Count: 221.
